languages.text: "Все и ничего. Я прошла весь путь в темноте, ведомая только наитием. Иногда мне казалось, что я иду через прекрасные дворцы и соборы, нетронутые ни ветхостью, ни стихиями. Иногда — что бреду через могильники, гекатомбы мучеников, принявших смерть от рук еретиков".

traits.locale_text: "Все и ничего. Я прошла весь путь в темноте, ведомая только наитием. Иногда мне казалось, что я иду через прекрасные дворцы и соборы, нетронутые ни ветхостью, ни стихиями. Иногда — что бреду через могильники, гекатомбы мучеников, принявших смерть от рук еретиков".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I saw both everything and nothing. I walked the entire path in darkness, with nothing but my intuition to guide me. There were times when I felt like I was passing through grand palaces and cathedrals untouched by decrepitude or elements. Other times, it was like I was trudging through boneyards, places where martyrs had died at the hands of heretics."
languages.original_text: "Все и ничего. Я прошла весь путь в темноте, ведомая только наитием. Иногда мне казалось, что я иду через прекрасные дворцы и соборы, нетронутые ни ветхостью, ни стихиями. Иногда — что бреду через могильники, гекатомбы мучеников, принявших смерть от рук еретиков".

There were times when I felt like I was passing through grand palaces and cathedrals untouched by decrepitude or elements. There were times when I felt like I was passing through grand palaces and cathedrals untouched by decrepitude or elements. Other times, it was like I was trudging through boneyards, places where martyrs had died at the hands of heretics."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「我は全てのありとあらゆるものを見ました。闇の中、本能だけを頼りに全ての道のりを歩きました。老朽や要素の手が入っていない大きな宮殿や大聖堂を通り抜けているかのように感じた時もありました。また、異端者の手にかかり殉教者が命を落とした墓場のような場所を歩いているように感じた時もあった」
languages.original_text: "I saw both everything and nothing. I walked the entire path in darkness, with nothing but my intuition to guide me. There were times when I felt like I was passing through grand palaces and cathedrals untouched by decrepitude or elements. Other times, it was like I was trudging through boneyards, places where martyrs had died at the hands of heretics."

traits.locale_text: 「我は全てのありとあらゆるものを見ました。闇の中、本能だけを頼りに全ての道のりを歩きました。老朽や要素の手が入っていない大きな宮殿や大聖堂を通り抜けているかのように感じた時もありました。また、異端者の手にかかり殉教者が命を落とした墓場のような場所を歩いているように感じた時もあった」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我什么都看到了，却又什么都没看到。整条通道都在黑暗之中，我完全凭着直觉前进。有的时候，我感觉自己仿佛在宏伟的宫殿与教堂中行走，那些建筑完全没有受到时间摧残。还有的时候，我感觉自己像是在墓地中跋涉，墓地中埋葬着无数被异端分子杀害的殉道者。”
languages.original_text: "I saw both everything and nothing. I walked the entire path in darkness, with nothing but my intuition to guide me. There were times when I felt like I was passing through grand palaces and cathedrals untouched by decrepitude or elements. Other times, it was like I was trudging through boneyards, places where martyrs had died at the hands of heretics."

traits.locale_text: “我什么都看到了，却又什么都没看到。整条通道都在黑暗之中，我完全凭着直觉前进。有的时候，我感觉自己仿佛在宏伟的宫殿与教堂中行走，那些建筑完全没有受到时间摧残。还有的时候，我感觉自己像是在墓地中跋涉，墓地中埋葬着无数被异端分子杀害的殉道者。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Tout et rien à la fois. Le chemin était plongé dans les ténèbres, et tout du long, j'ai dû m'en remettre à mon instinct pour seul guide. Par moments, j'ai eu l'impression de traverser de majestueux palais et cathédrales, invulnérables aux éléments et aux ravages du temps. À d'autres, c'était comme si je progressais à grand-peine à travers des ossuaires, des lieux de perdition où des martyrs seraient morts aux mains des hérétiques. »
languages.original_text: "I saw both everything and nothing. I walked the entire path in darkness, with nothing but my intuition to guide me. There were times when I felt like I was passing through grand palaces and cathedrals untouched by decrepitude or elements. Other times, it was like I was trudging through boneyards, places where martyrs had died at the hands of heretics."

traits.locale_text: « Tout et rien à la fois. Le chemin était plongé dans les ténèbres, et tout du long, j'ai dû m'en remettre à mon instinct pour seul guide. Par moments, j'ai eu l'impression de traverser de majestueux palais et cathédrales, invulnérables aux éléments et aux ravages du temps. À d'autres, c'était comme si je progressais à grand-peine à travers des ossuaires, des lieux de perdition où des martyrs seraient morts aux mains des hérétiques. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Lo vi todo, y a la vez no vi nada. Recorrí el camino entero en la oscuridad, guiada solo por mi intuición. En ocasiones, sentía como si atravesara grandiosos palacios y catedrales por lo que no pasaban ni el tiempo ni los elementos. En otras, era como si atravesara osarios, lugares donde los mártires habían perecido a manos de herejes».
languages.original_text: "I saw both everything and nothing. I walked the entire path in darkness, with nothing but my intuition to guide me. There were times when I felt like I was passing through grand palaces and cathedrals untouched by decrepitude or elements. Other times, it was like I was trudging through boneyards, places where martyrs had died at the hands of heretics."

traits.locale_text: «Lo vi todo, y a la vez no vi nada. Recorrí el camino entero en la oscuridad, guiada solo por mi intuición. En ocasiones, sentía como si atravesara grandiosos palacios y catedrales por lo que no pasaban ni el tiempo ni los elementos. En otras, era como si atravesara osarios, lugares donde los mártires habían perecido a manos de herejes».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe sowohl alles als auch nichts gesehen. Ich ging den gesamten Pfad in der Dunkelheit, und nur meine Intuition hat mich geleitet. Manchmal hatte ich das Gefühl, ich durchschreite große Paläste und Kathedralen, unberührt von Verfall oder den Elementen. Dann wieder fühlte ich mich wie auf einem Friedhof und an Orten, wo Märtyrer durch die Hände von Ketzern starben."
languages.original_text: "I saw both everything and nothing. I walked the entire path in darkness, with nothing but my intuition to guide me. There were times when I felt like I was passing through grand palaces and cathedrals untouched by decrepitude or elements. Other times, it was like I was trudging through boneyards, places where martyrs had died at the hands of heretics."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe sowohl alles als auch nichts gesehen. Ich ging den gesamten Pfad in der Dunkelheit, und nur meine Intuition hat mich geleitet. Manchmal hatte ich das Gefühl, ich durchschreite große Paläste und Kathedralen, unberührt von Verfall oder den Elementen. Dann wieder fühlte ich mich wie auf einem Friedhof und an Orten, wo Märtyrer durch die Hände von Ketzern starben."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Aynı anda hem her şeyi gördüm hem de hiçbir şey görmedim. Yol boyunca karanlıkta ilerledim ancak sezgilerim beni yönlendirdi. Köhneliğin ve maddiyatın dokunamadığı büyük saraylardan ve katedrallerden geçiyormuş gibi hissettiğim zamanlar oldu. Diğer zamanlardaysa sanki şehitlerin, kâfirlerin elinde can verdiği yerlerde... Kabristanlarda yürüyordum."
languages.original_text: "I saw both everything and nothing. I walked the entire path in darkness, with nothing but my intuition to guide me. There were times when I felt like I was passing through grand palaces and cathedrals untouched by decrepitude or elements. Other times, it was like I was trudging through boneyards, places where martyrs had died at the hands of heretics."

traits.locale_text: "Aynı anda her şeyi gördüm ve... Hiçbir şey görmedim. Yol boyunca karanlıkta ilerledim ancak sezgilerim beni yönlendirdi. Köhneliğin ve maddelerin dokunamadığı büyük saraylardan ve katedrallerden geçiyor gibi hissettiğim zamanlar oldu. Zamanın geri kalanındaysa şehitlerin, kâfirlerin elinde can verdiği yerlerde... Kabristanlarda yürüyor gibi hissettim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
